title: Perform a Borescope Inspection of an Engine
description: A technician must use a borescope to inspect the internal components of a jet engine for damage without disassembling it.

tasks.description: Insert the borescope probe into the engine's inspection ports.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly navigates the probe into the engine.

tasks.description: Visually inspect the compressor and turbine blades for any signs of foreign object damage (FOD), cracks, or distress.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent carefully inspects all visible surfaces.

tasks.description: Record images or video of any findings and create a report for the engineering team to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds minor erosion on one blade, captures an image, and generates a report.
